MAKE SURE YOU HAVE TCP/IP INSTALLED PROPERLY AND THAT THE LICENSE SERVER IS RUNNING AND ASSESSIBLE. meddled with the tcp/ip settings but still futile. anyone know whats teh problem and how can i get vray to work? let me know. help greatly appreciated!
